page.title: 06MULTICULTURAL EDUCATION 1
page.content: I am a Muslim girl and I go to Parkwood First School. I am 9 years old and I have{English, Punjabi, {Bengali, Chinese}and{Malaysian}friends there. Our school building is about 100 years old and is situated on the outskirts of Keighley, surrounded by allotments, streets of terraced houses and a wood on the hillside. The children in our school come from several different cultural and religious backgrounds. We celebrate each other's festivals, thus sharing each other's happiness and learning about the way other people live. We celebrated the{Hindu}festival of {Diwali}by lighting our hall with deevas (lamps made from clay) while girls performed an Indian dance. At the{Christian}festival of{Christmas}we put up trimmings and a tree, sang carols and had a party and presents.
